sections.title: Future Plans and Dreams → Planes futuros y sueños

listening.audio: What are your plans for the future?
options: What are your plans for the future?
What are your plans for today?
What are your plans for work?
What are your plans for vacation?
listening.answer: What are your plans for the future?

listening.audio: I want to become an engineer
options: I want to become an engineer
I want to become a teacher
I want to become a doctor
I want to become a manager
listening.answer: I want to become an engineer

listening.audio: My dream is to have my own business
options: My dream is to have my own business
My dream is to travel the world
My dream is to buy a house
My dream is to learn English
listening.answer: My dream is to have my own business

listening.audio: I'm going to study abroad next year
options: I'm going to study abroad next year
I'm going to work abroad next year
I'm going to travel abroad next year
I'm going to live abroad next year
listening.answer: I'm going to study abroad next year

listening.audio: Someday I will start my own company
options: Someday I will start my own company
Someday I will buy a house
Someday I will get married
Someday I will retire
listening.answer: Someday I will start my own company

fillInBlank.suffix: is to graduate from technical school.
find a good job after graduation.
I will continue my education.
save money to start my own business.
is working as a technician in a modern factory.

sections.title: Career Goals and Professional Development → Metas profesionales y desarrollo profesional

listening.audio: I want to advance in my career
options: I want to advance in my career
I want to change my career
I want to end my career
I want to start my career
listening.answer: I want to advance in my career

listening.audio: Professional development is important
options: Professional development is important
Professional development is expensive
Professional development is difficult
Professional development is unnecessary
listening.answer: Professional development is important

listening.audio: I hope to get a promotion soon
options: I hope to get a promotion soon
I hope to get a new job soon
I hope to get a raise soon
I hope to get training soon
listening.answer: I hope to get a promotion soon

listening.audio: Leadership skills are valuable in any job
options: Leadership skills are valuable in any job
Technical skills are valuable in any job
Communication skills are valuable in any job
Computer skills are valuable in any job
listening.answer: Leadership skills are valuable in any job

listening.audio: I want to specialize in industrial automation
options: I want to specialize in industrial automation
I want to specialize in computer programming
I want to specialize in business management
I want to specialize in quality control
listening.answer: I want to specialize in industrial automation

fillInBlank.suffix: is to become a team leader.
my leadership and communication skills.
helps workers advance in their careers.
a promotion within the next two years.
will help me advance in my career.

sections.title: Entrepreneurship and Business Ideas → Emprendimiento e ideas de negocio

listening.audio: I want to start my own business
options: I want to start my own business
I want to work for a big company
I want to be an employee
I want to retire early
listening.answer: I want to start my own business

listening.audio: Entrepreneurship requires hard work and dedication
options: requires hard work and dedication
is easy and profitable
guarantees success
doesn't need planning
listening.answer: requires hard work and dedication

listening.audio: My business idea is to open a technical service center
options: open a technical service center
start a restaurant
create a software company
begin a consulting business
listening.answer: open a technical service center

listening.audio: Young entrepreneurs have many opportunities in Costa Rica
options: have many opportunities in Costa Rica
face many challenges in Costa Rica
cannot succeed in Costa Rica
should leave Costa Rica
listening.answer: have many opportunities in Costa Rica

listening.audio: Innovation is key to business success
options: Innovation is key to business success
Money is key to business success
Luck is key to business success
Connections are key to business success
listening.answer: Innovation is key to business success

fillInBlank.suffix: is to become a successful entrepreneur.
a business idea for a technical repair shop.
requires courage and determination.
have the skills to start technology businesses.
small business development and entrepreneurship.

sections.title: Personal Development and Life Goals → Desarrollo personal y metas de vida

listening.audio: Personal development is a lifelong journey
options: Personal development is a lifelong journey
Personal development is only for young people
Personal development is not important
Personal development is too difficult
listening.answer: Personal development is a lifelong journey

listening.audio: I want to improve my communication skills
options: I want to improve my communication skills
I want to improve my technical skills
I want to improve my language skills
I want to improve my computer skills
listening.answer: I want to improve my communication skills

listening.audio: Setting goals helps you stay motivated
options: Setting goals helps you stay motivated
Setting goals is a waste of time
Setting goals is too difficult
Setting goals doesn't work
listening.answer: Setting goals helps you stay motivated

listening.audio: Learning English opens many opportunities
options: Learning English opens many opportunities
Learning English is not necessary
Learning English is too hard
Learning English takes too long
listening.answer: Learning English opens many opportunities

listening.audio: Work-life balance is important for happiness
options: Work-life balance is important for happiness
Work is more important than life
Life is more important than work
Balance is impossible to achieve
listening.answer: Work-life balance is important for happiness

fillInBlank.suffix: continuous learning and self-improvement.
is to have a successful and meaningful career.
will help me achieve my professional goals.
requires patience and consistent effort.
a good balance between work and personal life.

sections.title: Hopes for Costa Rica's Future → Esperanzas para el futuro de Costa Rica

listening.audio: Costa Rica has a bright future ahead
options: Costa Rica has a bright future ahead
Costa Rica has problems ahead
Costa Rica has challenges ahead
Costa Rica has uncertainty ahead
listening.answer: Costa Rica has a bright future ahead

listening.audio: Technical education will drive economic growth
options: Technical education will drive economic growth
University education will drive economic growth
Foreign investment will drive economic growth
Tourism will drive economic growth
listening.answer: Technical education will drive economic growth

listening.audio: Young people are the future of the country
options: Young people are the future of the country
Older people are the future of the country
Foreigners are the future of the country
Government is the future of the country
listening.answer: Young people are the future of the country

listening.audio: Costa Rica leads in environmental protection
options: Costa Rica leads in environmental protection
Costa Rica ignores environmental issues
Costa Rica has environmental problems
Costa Rica doesn't care about nature
listening.answer: Costa Rica leads in environmental protection

listening.audio: Innovation and technology create new opportunities
options: create new opportunities
eliminate old jobs
make life more difficult
are not important
listening.answer: create new opportunities

fillInBlank.suffix: Costa Rica will continue to prosper and develop.
will help Costa Rica build a skilled workforce.
will shape the country's future.
to sustainability sets a global example.
to my country's development and progress.
